name: Clustershot
description:
Shoot some slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes and more slimes.

Then you beat the level.

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Click to shoot

R to reload.
